Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 4th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1972...
Injured on 4/4/1973 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1975, off Dwight Siebler (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/1975, off Bob L. Miller (NYM)...
Traded from Los Angeles to Chicago (N) on 1/31/1977 (Going to LA: 2B M. DeJohn. Going to CHC: CF C. Lemon)...
Injured on 5/14/1978 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 6/4/1978 with a Inflamed Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Hit for the cycle against St. Louis on 4/26/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1980, hitting .462 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/1980, hitting .415 with 3 HR, 19 RBI...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 1/31/1981 (Going to CHC: 1B K. Hernandez. Going to NYY: SS C. Lemon)...
